title: Update Guest Preferences
description: A returning loyalty member wants to update their profile to always request a high-floor room away from the elevator.

tasks.description: Retrieve the guest's loyalty profile using their member number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates the guest's profile.

tasks.description: Navigate to the preferences section of the profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct area to update preferences.

tasks.description: Add 'High floor' and 'Away from elevator' as permanent stay preferences.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully saves the new preferences to the guest's profile.
